Name: Thai Green Cocktail
Instructions: MUDDLE first 3 ingredients in base of shaker. SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: Extracting the juice from the stems and leaves of the coriander is key to both the colour and flavour of this fresh-tasting cocktail, inspired by some of the flavours of a Thai Green Curry - only without the chilli heat.
History: Created in September 2014 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England to accompany Spiced Beef and Chilli Blinis.
